cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses automatic modelling of document coherence, which is a common topic in computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also mentions the use of coherence modelling for information retrieval (cs.IR). The proposed method involves graph metrics, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses the evaluation of the proposed method on standard settings, which is a common practice in information retrieval (cs.IR) and systems and control (cs.SI).
